message: Hello Bob, I'm thrilled to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm asking for $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
